pages.text: The Stone of Greater Inertia grants increased speed and jump height, however only grants partial knockback and fall damage resistance. Grants no resistance to kinetic damage.
$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)$(2)+75%$() Fall Damage Resistance$(br)$(2)+40%$() Knockback Resistance$(br)$(2)+150%$() Movement Speed$(br)$(2)+100%$() Jump Height
